ing: 4 ounces bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
des: "A wonderful side-dish for any southern-style-meal.  Goes great with cornbread and fried pork chops!"
ins: Place the purple hull peas into a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat, add okra if using and boil for 2 minutes, stirring twice. Reduce heat to medium-low, add the bacon, sugar, baking soda, salt, and pepper.  Cover and simmer until tender, 1 1/2 to 2 hours.
